questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A unique sculpture
C) A building
D) A natural landscape

What colors dominate the background of the photo?
A) Blue and white
B) Green and orange
C) Red and yellow
D) Black and white

What is the condition of the grass in the foreground?
A) Well-maintained
B) Overgrown
C) Bare and patchy
D) Covered in flowers

What can be seen behind the fence?
A) A park
B) A building with lights
C) A forest
D) A playground

What is the shape of the sculpture?
A) Abstract and rounded
B) Rectangular and flat
C) Triangular and pointed
D) Circular and smooth

Is there any text visible in the photo?
A) Yes, on a sign
B) No, there is no text
C) Yes, on the sculpture
D) Yes, on the grass

What kind of lighting is present in the photo?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Street lights
C) Indoor lighting
D) It is not clear

What is the texture of the sculpture?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Shiny
D) Transparent

What is the primary color of the sculpture?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White
D) Black

What is the ground surface made of in the foreground?
A) Concrete
B) Grass
C) Sand
D) Gravel

What is the relationship between the sculpture and the fence?
A) The sculpture is in front of the fence
B) The sculpture is behind the fence
C) The sculpture is part of the fence
D) The sculpture is next to the fence

What is the condition of the fence?
A) New and well-maintained
B) Old and rusty
C) Broken and damaged
D) It is not clear

What is the lighting source in the background?
A) Street lamps
B) Building lights
C) Car headlights
D) Moonlight

What is the position of the sculpture relative to the camera?
A) To the left
B) To the right
C) In the center
D) In the background

What is the height of the sculpture relative to the fence?
A) Taller
B) Shorter
C) Same height
D) It is not clear

What is the state of the grass in the foreground?
A) Dry and brown
B) Green and healthy
C) Overgrown and wild
D) Covered in leaves

What is the primary focus of the foreground?
A) The sculpture
B) The grass
C) The fence
D) The building

What is the main color of the fence?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green and orange
D) Black

What is the relationship between the sculpture and the building?
A) The sculpture is in front of the building
B) The sculpture is behind the building
C) The sculpture is inside the building
D) The sculpture is next to the building

What is the texture of the fence?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Shiny
D) Transparent

What is the relationship between the sculpture and the grass?
A) The sculpture is on the grass
B) The sculpture is next to the grass
C) The sculpture is under the grass
D) The sculpture is above the grass

What is the central element of the photo?
A) The sculpture
B) The fence
C) The building
D) The grass

What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A sculpture, fence and grass ground
D) Wildlife and animals
